text: Ivan Mactaggart is a British film producer best known for his 2017 production Loving Vincent, which earned him an Academy Award nomination for Best Animated Feature at the 90th Academy Awards. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:People from Cambridge Category:English animators Category:British animators Category:British animated film producers Category:English film producers Category:British film producers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ivan Mactaggart
